students.profile_en:
An agent of C&C, a secret organization of the Millennium School.

Akane operates under the callsign Zero-Three. She became known as the Master Cleaner for her modus operandi of infiltrating the enemy camp and cleaning it out with explosives, all while wearing that same gentle smile.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:DEF> by <?2> for 30s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 40s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_sub_description: Attacks have a 10% chance to decrease the target's <d:Dodge> by <?1> for 30s. 5s cooldown between activations.
students.weapon_name_jp: サイレントソリューション

students.profile_en:
A member of the Gehenna Gourmet Research Society.

Don't let her charming appearance fool you. A glutton with a massive appetite, she's the reigning champion of various competitive eating contests across Kivotos. She possesses a mild-mannered and kind personality, but she can prank as well as any other student at Gehenna Academy.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.
students.skill_normal_description: Attacks have a 10% chance to increase <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s. 15s cooldown between activations.
students.skill_sub_name_jp: I Still Got Room for More!
students.skill_sub_description: Attacks have a 10% chance to increase <b:ATK> by <?1> for 26s. 18s cooldown between activations.

students.skill_ex_name_jp: 偵察データを共有します
students.skill_ex_description: Increases the <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?2> of one ally for 16s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 45s, heals one ally for <?1> of healing power.
students.skill_sub_name_jp: サポートはお任せください
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
A member of the Game Development Department at the Millennium School.

A mysterious girl who was found sleeping within some ruins. All information regarding Aris' age and origins is unknown. Currently, she has become a hardcore video game fanatic thanks to Midori and Momoi. The majority of her inarticulate speech is comprised of dialog from retro video games.
students.skill_ex_name_jp: 世界の 法則が 崩壊します！
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line. Damage increases by 1.5 or 2 times depending on <s:EnergyBatteryHalf> (charge resets after skill use).
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> for 20s and increases <s:EnergyBatteryHalf> by one (maximum charge level is 2).
students.skill_sub_name_jp: 覚醒せよ、スーパーノヴァ！
students.skill_sub_description: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> for 20s when Aris uses her EX skill. Effect increases by 1.5 or 2 times depending on <s:EnergyBatteryHalf>.
students.weapon_name_jp: 光の剣：スーパーノヴァ

students.profile_en:
The self-proclaimed boss of Problem Solver 68.

Aru expanded the Gehenna Academy's Problem Solver 68 club without permission to conduct illegal business activities. She aspires to be seen as a dashing and debonair villain, but her frequent blunders always expose her as a poser.
students.skill_ex_description: Fires a shot that deals <?1> damage to one enemy and explodes for an additional <?2> damage to enemies in a circular area around the target.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, fires a shot that deals <?1> damage to one enemy with a 50% chance to explode for an additional <?2> damage to enemies in a circular area around the target.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases the critical chance of Aru's EX skill by <?1>.
students.weapon_name_jp: ワインレッド・アドマイアー

students.profile_en:
An agent of C&C, a secret organization of the Millennium School.

Armed with brutal instinct and intuition, Asuna is a seasoned veteran who has successfully overcome countless challenges under the callsign Zero-One. She is also something of a loose cannon, doing things such as revealing her identity on secret missions and smashing anything that looks suspicious without a second thought. However, she always manages to produce great results in the end.
students.skill_ex_description: Dashes forward in the specified direction, increasing <b:Dodge> temporarily by 43.4% during the dash and increasing <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by a further <?1> for 30s when Asuna uses her EX skill.
students.weapon_name_jp: サプライズパーティー

students.skill_ex_description: Decreases the <d:DEF> of enemies in a circular area by <?1> for 40s and deals <?2> damage to them.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 35s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 23s.
students.skill_passive_name_jp: もっともっと楽しもう!
students.skill_sub_description: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s when Asuna uses her EX skill.
students.weapon_name_jp: サプライズパーティー

students.profile_en:
The diligent secretary of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

A hard-working stickler for rules and regulations, she does her best to contribute to the revitalization of Abydos High School.
students.skill_ex_description: Heals all allies in a circular area for <?1> of healing power.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, increases <b:CriticalChanceResistPoint> of allies in a circular area by <?1> for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
The ice queen of Trinity's Make-Up Work Club.

After dropping out of school, she ended up at Trinity and is studying again. Despite being lonely, Azusa distances herself from others to avoid causing trouble—a source of concern for the other Make-Up Work Club members.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:DEF> by <?2> for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Deals an additional <?1> damage to enemies inflicted with a debuff.

students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy, and deals an additional <?2> <d:Chill> damage over time for 20s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 35s, increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 30s.
students.skill_sub_description: Attacks have a 30% chance to decrease the target's <d:DEF> by <?1> for 13s. 5s cooldown between activations.

students.profile_en:
Student body president of Red Winter Academy.

Greedy and obsessed with power, she loses her position in a revolution once a week but somehow always regains her authority. Cherino believes her power comes from the the fake mustache she wears as a symbol of authority.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to all nearby enemies.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 40s, applies <d:ConcentratedTarget> to the enemy with the highest attack, and lowers their <d:CriticalChanceResistPoint> by <?1> for 15s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases skill cost recovery speed by <?1>. Effect is increased by <?2> for every other Red Winter student in the team (up to a maximum of 3 times).

students.profile_en:
She is in charge of medical aid at Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.

Chinatsu is one of the few people with common sense among the obsessively dogmatic Prefect Team. She's usually the one who prevents other members like Ako and Iori from running amok. Her tone can be harsh and give the impression of being just as cold as any other member of the Prefect Team, but she is actually a sweet young girl who melts at the sight of cute animals.
students.skill_ex_description: Heals one ally for <?1> of healing power<?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 40s, increases the <b:Dodge> of the ally with the lowest current HP by <?1> for 30s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:DEF> by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
A spacey girl who is a member of the Hyakkiyako Academy's Yin-Yang Club.

Extremely fond of traditional activities such as writing haiku, which led her to join the Yin-Yang Club. Her exotic looks and presence have made her the envy of her peers at Hyakkiyako, but she seems completely oblivious to that fact.
students.skill_ex_description: Creates a zone that deals <?1> damage over time to enemies in a circular area at the selected location for 10s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.
students.skill_sub_description: Attacks have a 10% chance to deal an additional <?1> <d:Burn> damage over time for 20s. 5s cooldown between activations.

students.profile_en:
An agent of the Super Phenomenon Task Force at the Millennium School.

An emotionally inscrutable oddball, Eimi very rarely speaks and can often be found staring off into space for no particular reason. However, there's no one as brutally efficient as her when it comes to carrying out missions for Seminar.
students.skill_ex_description: Gains <b:DotHeal> equal to 3.4% of Eimi's lost HP plus <?1> of healing power for 20s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 15s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases <b:OppressionResist> by <?1> while Eimi's HP is below 50%.

students.hobbies: Cooking homestyle dishes, packing bento lunches
students.profile_en:
A member of the School Lunch Club that manages the Gehenna Academy's dining hall.

A kind and earnest student, making her a bit of a rarity at Gehenna. She prepares and serves hundreds of meals every morning for the students of Gehenna. She's a good cook, but her skills are written off due to the dining hall's lack of manpower. Still, she refuses to give up and is constantly looking for ways to improve the menu.
students.skill_ex_description: Repositions up to 4 allies in a circular area to the selected location and heals them for <?1> of healing power.
students.skill_normal_name_jp: Gift of the School Lunch Club
students.skill_normal_description: Every 20s, increases the <b:DEF> of the ally with the highest max HP by <?1> for 16s.
students.skill_sub_name_jp: Pride of the School Lunch Club
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalChanceResistPoint> by <?1>.
students.weapon_name_en: School Lunch Club Type-A Defense Weapon

students.profile_en:
A senior member of Problem Solver 68.

Her gloomy personality has made her the target of bullies since childhood. Only recently was Aru able to help her put a stop to the harassment. Since then, she has been the youngest senior member of Problem Solver 68. She may be timid and have painfully low self-esteem, but may also be the most terrifying member of her club because of her ideas alone.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 20s, increases <b:DEF> by <?1> for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Whenever Haruka takes damage, 5% chance to increase <b:DEF> by <?1> for 15s. 10s cooldown between activations.

students.profile_en:
President of the Gehenna Gourmet Research Society.

At a glance, she appears to possess the graceful charisma of a refined lady. But when it comes to food, she can turn into a deranged maniac at the flip of a switch. Despite her uncontrollable gluttony, she actually can't stomach too much food at once. Her favorite foods are those rich in fat, such as motsunabe and horumonyaki.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line. Damage is reduced by 10% per enemy hit (up to a maximum of 70% reduction).
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> when Haruna is standing still.

students.skill_ex_name_jp: この一瞬一瞬に、心を込めて！
students.skill_ex_description: Heals all allies in range of the selected location for <?1> of healing power and summons Miku for 26s. While Miku is on field, increases all nearby allies' <b:ATK> by <?2> as long as they stay within range.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, increases <b:CriticalChance> of allies in a circular area by <?1> for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:HealEffectiveness> by <?1>.
students.weapon_name_jp: ライブ用Tシャツキャノン

students.hobbies: Collecting Peroro merch, shopping, listening to others
students.profile_en:
A friendly, outgoing member of the Trinity Make-Up Work Club.

Hifumi's just a regular girl with average grades, but she’s nonetheless well liked and popular for her well-rounded personality. She's a good listener for anyone who needs to vent about their worries or problems, but this also causes her to get swept up in the moment and unintentionally cause trouble.
students.skill_ex_description: Summons a Peroro decoy with 160% of Hifumi's max HP, dealing <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and <c:Provoke> them for <?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 35s, deals 212% damage to one enemy and decrease their <d:HIT> by <?1> for 30s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases skill cost recovery speed by <?1> for 5s after using Hifumi's EX skill.

students.hobbies: Collecting Peroro merch, shopping, listening to others
students.skill_ex_name_jp: クルセイダーちゃん、お願いします!
students.skill_ex_description: Deploys Hifumi in a Crusader-class Tank for 50s, with an additional <?1> of Hifumi's attack. Every 20s, deals <?2> damage to enemies in a circular area. Only one tactical support vehicle may be deployed at any given time.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.
students.skill_sub_name_jp: アングリーアデリーさんの加護
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
Head prefect of the Gehenna Academy Prefect Team.

Somewhat aloof and considers almost everything a bother and a chore, but is still every bit the head prefect of the Prefect Team when it comes to rules and regulations.
Her general response to most things is "Ugh, so annoying," but she's ruthless and decisive when it comes to matters on the battlefield.
Feared and respected by the enemies of Gehenna.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
students.skill_normal_description: When Hina runs out of ammo, immediately reloads and increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 16s.
students.skill_sub_description: Deals an additional <?1> damage to enemies not in cover.

students.skill_ex_name_jp: 絶海：イシュ・ボシェテ
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to up to 5 enemies in a fan-shaped area.
students.skill_normal_name_jp: スローアンドノックアウト
students.skill_normal_description: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>.
students.skill_sub_description: When Hina uses her EX skill, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> until the end of battle. Effect can stack up to 5 times.

students.profile_en:
The Abydos Student Council vice president and president of the Foreclosure Task Force.

Acts more like a tired old timer and would rather play pranks than do actual work. This often gets her into trouble with her fellow task force members, but once on a mission, she fights harder on the front lines than anyone else to keep her friends safe.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a cone-shaped area<?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: Once per battle when HP falls below 30%, gains <b:DotHeal> equal to <?1> of healing power for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: While using her EX skill, Hoshino gains a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of healing power. Barrier is dispelled once EX skill has finished.

students.profile_en:
A cold-blooded specialist of Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.

She uses her overwhelming force as field captain to ruthlessly discipline offenders. Iori is highly efficient and formidable in combat, but her stubbornness causes her to fall for even the most obvious traps.
students.skill_ex_description: Fires 3 shots at an enemy that deal <?1> damage to the target and enemies in a fan-shaped area behind them.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_sub_description: Deals an additional <?1> damage to enemies when Iori is not taking cover.

students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy, and deals an additional <?2> <d:Chill> damage over time for 20s.
students.skill_sub_name_jp: スペシャリストの威力
students.skill_sub_description: Attacks have a 25% chance to deal an additional <?1> <d:Chill> damage over time for 20s. 10s cooldown between activations.

students.profile_en:
A member of the Gehenna Gourmet Research Society with a voracious appetite.

She loves food so much that she even gobbles up dishes that others would dislike with gusto.
students.skill_ex_description: Restores own HP by <?1> of healing power<?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: Whenever Izumi normal attacks, she has a 20% chance to deal <?1> damage to one enemy. 10s cooldown between activations.
students.skill_sub_description: Deals between <?1> ~ <?2> additional damage based on Izumi's current HP.

students.skill_ex_name_jp: つめた~いココナッツジュース!
students.skill_ex_description: Throws a coconut at an enemy that deals <?1> damage and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>, ricocheting to other nearby enemies that have not been hit yet, up to 5 times. (Subsequent hits are reduced by 10% for each enemy).
students.skill_normal_name_jp: 甘酸つぱくて美味しい!
students.skill_normal_description: Every 35s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s.
students.skill_passive_name_jp: さぁ、ご飯食べたし頑張ろ~!
students.skill_sub_name_jp: 美味しいけどキーンってなるね~
students.skill_sub_description: Attacks have a 10% chance to <c:Stunned> the target for <?1>. 20s cooldown between activations.

students.hobbies: Studying the art of ninjutsu, squiring her lord
students.profile_en:
A member of the Hyakkiyako Academy's Ninjutsu Research Club.

A bright and bubbly young girl, but her devotion to her strange dream has caused her to spend most of her life as a loner. She devotes herself to becoming the best ninja she can everyday. That also includes following around and referring to Sensei as her lord among other things.
students.skill_ex_description: Repositions to the selected location and increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 6 normal attacks, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s after using EX skill.
students.weapon_name_jp: イズナ流スーパー忍具

students.profile_en:
Resident glutton of the Gehenna Gourmet Research Society.

Though Junko's more of a conventional gastronome compared to the other binge-eating, frankenfood-gobbling members of the Gourmet Research Society, she still goes hog wild when presented with a scrumptious delicacy.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line and sacrifices 25.7% of her current HP.
students.skill_normal_name_jp: Don't Talk to Me When I'm Hungry!
students.skill_normal_description: When Junko's HP falls below 20%, she becomes <s:Immortal> for <?1> once per battle.
students.skill_sub_description: Deals between <?1> ~ <?2> additional damage based on Junko's missing HP.
students.weapon_name_jp: ダイナーズアウトロー

students.profile_en:
A member of the School Lunch Club that manages the Gehenna Academy's dining hall.

Like Fuuka, she's a hard worker who pours her heart and soul into cooking meals for the other students. However, her cooking is so bad that it's grotesque, so her efforts are ultimately useless. But she continues to strive to hopefully improve her cooking under Fuuka's encouragement and guidance.
students.skill_ex_description: Repositions up to 4 enemies within a circular area and deals <?1> <d:Poison> damage over time to them for 20s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 20s, decreases the <d:AttackSpeed> of the enemy with the highest attack by <?1> for 16s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.
students.weapon_name_en: School Lunch Club Type-B Defense Weapon

students.profile_en:
The department head of Problem Solver 68.

Often mistaken for a rough-and-tumble delinquent due to her naturally intimidating appearance, but unlike the rest of Problem Solver 68, she holds no ill will toward anyone. Kayoko opts not to say anything about these misunderstandings, but this only adds to the perception that she's someone to be feared.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and inflicts <c:Fear> for <?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy with a 30% chance to inflict <c:Fear> for 3.6s.
students.skill_sub_description: Deals an additional <?1> damage to enemies inflicted with a crowd-control effect.

students.skill_ex_name_jp: 交渉はここまでですね……!
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and creates a smokescreen for 20s that decreases the <d:HIT> of enemies inside it by <?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to the furthest enemy in Kirino's attack range and decreases their <d:HIT> by <?2> for 13s.
students.skill_sub_description: Attacks have a 30% chance to decrease the target's <d:HealEffectiveness> by <?1> for 13s. 5s cooldown between activations.
students.weapon_name_jp: 第3号ヴァルキューレ制式拳銃

students.profile_en:
A member of Veritas, a hacker group at the Millennium Science School.

A mischievous student who enjoys drawing graffiti and designed Veritas' emblem. She has a flighty personality and doesn't take anything seriously, which often sparks conflict with other clubs.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy and increases <b:ATK> by <?2> for 30s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, marks one enemy and decreases their <d:DEF> by <?1> for 15s.
students.skill_sub_description: Deals an additional <?1> damage to enemies marked by Maki.

students.skill_ex_description: Grants a <b:Shield> to one ally with HP equal to <?1> of healing power lasting up to 20s and remove all of their debuffs.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
Illustrator of the Game Development Department at the Millennium School.

Both Midori and her twin sister, Momoi, develop games with the Game Development Department.
Though her introverted personality had previously put her at odds with her more gregarious older sister, the two are now inseparable thanks to their shared love of video games.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage 5 times to nearby targets. If Momoi is in the team, deals an additional <?2> <d:Poison> damage over time for 20s. (Only once per unique target)
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, heals the ally with lowest HP (except herself) for <?1> of healing power.
students.skill_passive_name_jp: アーティストインスピレーション
students.skill_sub_name_jp: 開発者シナジー：モモイ
students.skill_sub_description: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>. If Momoi is in the team, increases by <?2> instead.
students.weapon_name_jp: フレッシュ・インスピレーション

students.profile_en:
Problem Solver 68's resident go-getter and chief of staff.

Unlike Aru, who has a semblance of a conscience, Mutsuki is a devilish troublemaker who relishes in committing acts of mayhem. As one of her oldest friends, Aru understands her bravado better than anyone, but she doesn't necessarily support it.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in 3 circular areas.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 20s, places 3 landmines a fixed distance in front of Mutuski that deal <?1> damage if triggered. Landmines last for 15s.
students.skill_sub_description: Attacks have a 25% chance to increase <b:HIT> by <?1> for 30s. 25s cooldown between activations.
students.weapon_name_jp: トリックオアトリック

students.skill_ex_name_jp: こういう時のとっておき
students.skill_ex_description: Restores own HP by <?1> of healing power and removes all debuffs.
students.skill_normal_name_jp: これ食べて元気出して
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, increases the <b:ATK> of an ally by <?1> for 20s. Effect can bounce to additional nearby allies who have not received the buff yet, up to 3 times (cannot affect Natsu).
students.skill_sub_description: When Natsu uses her EX skill, increases <b:HealEffectiveness> by <?1> until the end of battle. Effect can stack up to 3 times.
students.weapon_name_jp: ビヨンド・ザ・ルミネーション

students.profile_en:
President of C&C, a secret organization of the Millennium School.

At first glance, Neru looks like nothing but a young delinquent with a flashy baseball jacket draped over her maid outfit, but in reality she's Millennium's most formidable agent.Within Millennium, her callsign, Double O, is seen as a sign of certain victory.
students.skill_ex_name_jp: You Got a Death Wish or Somethin'?
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy. Damage increases by <?2> times if Neru is <s:Fury>.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, Neru becomes <s:Fury> and increases <b:Dodge> by <?1> for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Whenever Neru becomes <s:Fury>, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s.

students.skill_ex_description: Repositions and deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area at the selected location, gaining a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?3> of healing power for 20s<?2>.
students.skill_normal_name_jp: 見せもんじゃねぇっての！
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, increases <b:Dodge> by <?1> for 23s.
students.skill_sub_name_jp: もっと痛いのが好きか？
students.skill_sub_description: Deals an additional <?1> damage to medium-sized enemies.

students.profile_en:
A member of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

A friendly, pleasant girl that provides the Foreclosure Task Force with much-needed emotional support to balance out the extreme personalities of its other members. Though she doesn't show it, she comes from a wealthy family and pays for nearly all of the Foreclosure Task Force's snacks out of her own pocket.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Deals an additional <?1> damage to large-sized enemies.

students.profile_en:
A devout vigilante admirer attending Hyakkiyako Academy.

Pina has a bubbly, energetic personality and takes pleasure in helping others. Everything she knows about vigilantes comes from movies, so the accuracy of said knowledge can be somewhat dubious. Nonetheless, she persists in her ambition of becoming a vigilante herself.
students.skill_ex_description: Immediately reloads, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s and the next <?2> normal attacks will have no delay.
students.skill_normal_description: When HP falls below 20% restores own HP by <?1> of healing power once per battle.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> after standing still for 10s.

students.profile_en:
The conscientious treasurer of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

Serika nags a lot and does not hesitate to let her opinions be known. Despite her habit of bashing the academy, saying, "To hell with this academy!" she is secretly quite devoted to it and even works part-time jobs to try and help pay off the academy's debts.
students.skill_ex_description: Immediately reloads and increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 30s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s after Serika uses her EX skill.

students.profile_en:
The sporty field captain of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

A girl of few words and almost no facial expression, Shiroko gives the impression of being frigid and emotionless. In truth, she is more devoted to the Abydos Academy than anything else. If it's for the sake of revitalizing the academy, she'll do whatever it takes and sometimes propose some outlandish ideas herself.
students.skill_ex_description: Summons a drone that deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.
students.skill_sub_description: Attacks have a 20% chance to increase <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s. 25s cooldown between activations.

students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and decreases their <d:ATK> by <?2> for 10s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 40s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a straight line.
students.skill_sub_description: Deals an additional <?1> damage to enemies inflicted with a debuff.

students.hobbies: Serving and charming customers, Idol Punch
students.profile_en:
President of the Festival Operations Department at Hyakkiyako Academy.

The mascot of Momoyodou, the Hyakkiyako's traditional tea house. Acts clumsy, but only because it sells her image as an idol. In truth, she's an expert flirt willing to do anything for the success of the festivals and Momoyodou. Wears her heart on her sleeve, making her an easy read for her friends as well as Sensei.
students.skill_ex_description: Deploys cover with HP equal to a set amount plus <?1> of Shizuko's max HP and increases <b:HIT> of allies in a circular area around it by <?2> for 30s.
students.skill_normal_name_en: Don't Stand in the Way of Business!
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:ATK> by <?2> for 21s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
Instructor of Shanhaijing's Disciplinary Support Department, Plum Blossom Garden.

An instructor to young students at the Plum Blossom Garden. The little students hold her and Shanhaijing in high regard. She is seldom angered by the mischievous antics of her young students due to her extensive experience. However, asking her age is off limits.
students.skill_ex_name_jp: Where Did You Go, You Rascals?
students.skill_ex_description: Increases damage of <s:FormChange> to 153%, <b:Range> by 24.2%, <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> but decreases <d:AttackSpeed> by 18.8% for 30s.
students.skill_normal_description: Generates <?1> bars of skill cost once at the start of battle.
students.skill_sub_description: Deals an additional <?1> damage to medium-sized enemies.

students.profile_en:
President of Hyakkiyako Academy's Inner Discipline Club.

Her motivation for training regularly is to attain "a more comfortable and restful sleep." Thanks to her diligent training, she is able to sleep while sitting, standing, or even while eating. Her prowess earned her the nickname "Sleeping Beauty." Though she seems to be constantly on the verge of nodding off, at night she takes to the streets to keep them safe.
students.skill_ex_description: Increases <b:DEF> by <?1> for 30s and <c:Provoke> all nearby enemies for <?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: When HP falls below 30% restores own HP by <?1> of healing power once per battle.
students.skill_sub_description: Reduces <b:DamagedRatio> by <?1> while reloading.

students.profile_en:
Member of the Engineering Club at the Millennium Science School.

Socially inept and inarticulate compared to other students, but is a prolific inventor due to her innate talent for engineering. Her inventions are considered to be flawless masterpieces, but they often come equipped with baffling and obscure functions.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in 5 circular areas.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area centered on the enemy with the lowest HP.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
An agent of C&C, a secret organization from the Millennium Science School.

She's in charge of providing rear fire support under the callsign Zero-Two. Despite her intimidating appearance, she is the most cautious of C&C's agents and often ends up having to reel in Asuna and Akane when they get out of control during missions.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy. If the target enemy is colossal-sized, deal an additional <?2> damage.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 40s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy with a 50% chance to inflict <c:Stunned> for 3.1s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area. This attack ignores up to <?2> of the enemy's defense.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area. This attack ignores up to <?2> of the enemy's defense.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases <b:CriticalChance> by <?1> for 40s after Karin uses her EX skill.

students.profile_en:
Leader of the Millennium Athletics Training Club.

An athletic girl with a passion for physical training. She is very much a jock and believes all problems can be solved with muscles and exercise.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 40s, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases defense by <?1> while not inflicted with a crowd-control effect.
students.weapon_name_jp: ミレニアム製最新型ダンベル

students.profile_en:
President of Millennium's Game Development Department.

Yuzu struggles with social anxiety and finds it difficult to deal with people, so she spends most of her time in a cabinet in the Game Development Department. Despite that, her passion for games is second to none. She loves both making and playing games.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area centered on one enemy.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area centered on the enemy with the highest attack.
students.skill_sub_description: When Yuzu uses either her Normal or EX Skill, increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 6s.

students.profile_en:
An engineer of Veritas, the hacker group of the Millennium Science School.

An unprecedented genius even amongst the brilliant minds at Millennium. Most of the school's cutting-edge technology was developed by her. Even with all these achievements, she remains humble, friendly, and considerate towards her peers.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, decreases the <d:HealEffectiveness> of one enemy by <?1> for 15s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:Dodge> by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
Scenario writer of the Game Development Department at the Millennium School.

Both Momoi and her twin sister, Midori, develop games with the Game Development Department. Though her lighthearted and cheerful personality previously put her at odds with her more introverted little sister, the two are now inseparable thanks to their shared love of video games.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area. If Midori is in the team, deals an additional <?2> <d:Burn> damage over time for 20s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, increases <b:HIT> by <?1> for 20s.
students.skill_passive_name_jp: クリエイティブセンス
students.skill_sub_name_jp: 開発者シナジー：ミドリ
students.skill_sub_description: Increases <b:ATK> by <?1>. If Midori is in the team, increases by <?2> instead.
students.weapon_name_jp: ユニーク・アイディア

students.profile_en:
A student suspended from Red Winter Academy and on probation in Former Institute 227.

She was suspended for constantly monitoring Sensei through a telescope. Nodoka wants to observe the world's beauty and sees Sensei in the same vein. Being in Spec Ops No. 227 has taught her to be careful with what little money she has to get by.
students.skill_ex_description: Increases <b:HIT> of allies in a circular area by <?1> for 20s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:Dodge> by <?2> for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:HIT> by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
A genius inventor of the Shanhaijing Academy.

A prodigy who earned six degrees while still in primary school. However, she's known more for the way she causes trouble for others through her unruly antics than for her genius. She's always accompanied by her rat, Nezusuke, whom she's known since childhood and regards as family.
students.skill_ex_description: Creates a zone that deals <?1> damage over time to enemies in a circular area at the selected location for 8s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 20s, deals <?1> <d:Poison> damage over time to one enemy and decreases their <d:CriticalChance> by 12.1% for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

students.skill_ex_name_jp: ぼく様からのプレゼントなのだ!
students.skill_ex_description: Creates a rectangular zone that continuously deals <?1> damage to enemies inside it for 20s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.
students.skill_sub_name_jp: 怪しい薬じゃないってば!
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.

students.skill_ex_name_jp: そういうのはダメなんですよ？
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy. This attack ignores up to <?2> of the enemy's defense.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_sub_description: Decreases <d:ATK> by 21.7% for 20s after Shun uses her EX skill. After this effect expires, increases <b:ATK> by <?1> for 20s.

students.profile_en:
President of the Engineering Club at the Millennium Science School.

Has invented a variety of robots, if only to stake her claim to the title of president of the Engineering Club. Her pet robot Thundergun has been determined to possess combat capabilities equivalent to a hundred PMC combat automata.
students.skill_ex_description: Summons a turret with <?1> of Utaha's attack power for 30s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, summons a turret with <?1> of Utaha's attack power for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:MAXHP> by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
The treasurer of Seminar, the student council of the Millennium Science School.

Yuuka has a mathematical acumen that is notable even among Millennium's high ratio of STEM students. She oversees the entirety of Millennium's budget. Her special talent is the abacus, and she has a habit of fiddling with the beads when dealing with emotional or mental conflicts.
students.skill_ex_description: Gains a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of Yuuka's healing power lasting up to <?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 15s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_sub_description: Whenever Yuuka takes cover, restores own HP by <?1> of healing power. 10s cooldown between activations.

students.profile_en:
A hacker of Veritas, Millennium Science School's infamous hacking group.

Wiretapping is her specialty, and she takes great pleasure in eavesdropping on other people's private conversations. A socially awkward young lady who addresses even younger students with formal deference. In real life, she's mousy and shy, but on the internet she's a surprisingly glib wordsmith.
students.skill_ex_description: Increases the <b:ATK> of all allies in a circular area by <?1> for 30s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy and decreases their <d:ATK> by 18.9% for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:ATK> by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
Member of the Engineering Club at the Millennium Science School.

A chatterbox who loves discussing topics such as physics and mechanics. She's always the first one at the scene to explain what's happening whenever there's a machinery-related problem at Millennium.
students.skill_ex_description: Repositions up to 4 allies in range to the selected location and grants them a <b:Shield> equal to <?1> of healing power.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 35s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
students.skill_sub_description: When Kotori defeats an enemy, increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 30s.

students.profile_en:
A member of Trinity's Make-Up Work Club.

Koharu was originally part of the Justice Task Force, but she was forced to transfer to the Make-Up Work Club due to poor grades which put her at risk of flunking. A dunce who can't keep up with her classes despite think she's an elite student. Koharu reads racy material for fun, and gets dirty ideas from the most trivial things, which ends with her embarrassing herself.
students.skill_ex_description: Throws a grenade that heals allies for <?1> of healing power and deals <?2> damage to enemies in a circular area.
students.skill_normal_description: When an ally has less than 50% HP, heals them for <?1> of healing power. 20s cooldown between activations, Koharu herself cannot be affected.
students.skill_passive_name_jp: これでも頑張ってるの！
students.skill_sub_description: Every 30s, increases healing power <b:HealPower> by <?1> for 20s.
students.weapon_name_jp: ジャスティス・ブラック

students.hobbies: Climbing to high places, keeping an observation diary
students.profile_en:
A devoted member of the Trinity Academy's Justice Task Force.

Armed with a massive sniper rifle that towers over her, Mashiro stoically provides fire support.Though not much one for words, she isn't shy or socially inept and actually becomes quite talkative when it comes to justice.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy with a <?2> chance of dealing an additional <?3> damage.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 20s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:HIT> by <?1>.

students.hobbies: Climbing to high places, keeping an observation diary
students.skill_ex_description: Decreases the <d:Dodge> of one enemy by <?1> for 30s, and deals <?2> damage to them.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, increases the <b:CriticalDamage> of the ally with the highest attack by <?1> for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:HIT> by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
President of Trinity's Justice Task Force and its official strategic weapon.

She is belligerent and violent, with a tendency to destroy anything she doesn't like. However, thanks to the painstaking efforts of the task force's vice president, Hasumi, the club has managed to hold itself together. Tsurugi is like a beast that can't be controlled, but even she can't help but soften up when she's with her Sensei.
students.skill_ex_description: Immediately reloads, changes <s:FormChange> to deal 138% damage to enemies in a fan-shaped area and increases <b:ATK> by <?1>. Effect ends after Tsurugi reloads <?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: Whenever Tsurugi defeats an enemy, restores own HP by <?1> of healing power. 10s cooldown between activations.
students.skill_sub_description: When Tsurugi defeats an enemy, <?1> chance to restore 1 ammo to her weapon.
students.weapon_name_jp: ブラッド＆ガンパウダー

students.skill_ex_description: Improves <s:FormChange> to deal an additional <?1> damage for <?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 35s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_sub_description: When Tsurugi uses her Normal Skill, increases <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> for 30s.
students.weapon_name_jp: ブラッド＆ガンパウダー

students.hobbies: Checking out dessert shops, tea parties
students.profile_en:
A cheerful member of the Trinity After-School Sweets Club.

Has a relaxed and easy-going personality and cherishes the time she spends sampling desserts and chatting with her friends. Her favorite dessert is ice cream, and she's recently gotten hooked on mint chocolate chip.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and decreases the <d:MoveSpeed> by 22.8% <?2>of enemies hit for 20s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, decreases the <d:AttackSpeed> of one enemy by <?1> for 30s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1>.
students.weapon_skill_passive_description: Increases healing power <b:HealPower> by <?1> and <b:ATK> by <?2>.

students.profile_en:
A cheerful and energetic first-year member of the Trinity Remedial Knights.

Hanae has a vivacious personality and a positive outlook on life, but when she sees a patient, she can get too worked up and often actually worsens their condition. She's a bit odd at times, but patients under her care seem to recover more quickly regardless of their affliction.
students.skill_ex_description: Grants <b:DotHeal> to one ally equal to <?1> of healing power over 20s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, increases the <b:DEF> of the ally with the lowest HP by <?1> for 20s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>.
students.weapon_skill_passive_description: Increases healing power <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

students.profile_en:
A friendly girl from the Make-Up Work Club.

She may appear like a quiet and elegant young lady at first, but a bevy of inappropriate and lewd comments spew out any time Hanako opens her mouth. Every member of the Make-Up Work Club gets nervous whenever Hanako starts speaking.
students.skill_ex_name_jp: 禁じられた遊びを始めましょう
students.skill_ex_description: Creates a circular zone that continuously restores the HP of all allies inside it by <?1> of healing power over 8s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 20s, increases the <b:DEF> of the ally with the lowest HP by <?1> for 13s.
students.skill_sub_name_jp: 一緒なら恥ずかしくありません！
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' healing power <b:HealPower> by <?1>.
students.weapon_skill_passive_description: Increases healing power <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

students.profile_en:
The second-in-command of Trinity's Justice Task Force.

Hasumi also acts as the task force's tactical commander on behalf of the wild and ferocious club president, Tsurugi. She may seem like any other ordinary Trinity student, but make no mistake, she's a Justice Task Force member through and through. At times she'll do incredibly reckless things with absolute calm.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_normal_description: Whenever Hasumi defeats an enemy, immediately reload weapon and increases <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1> for 13s.
students.skill_sub_description: Whenever Hasumi reloads, increases the <b:CriticalChance> of the next attack by <?1>.

students.profile_en:
A kind-hearted girl affiliated with the Trinity Remedial Knights.

A virtuous person who enjoys charity work, her concern for the health of those around her has earned her a reputation as a sort of mother hen. Despite having a somewhat timid personality and avoiding quarrels and conflict, she is always ready to stand up against enemies who threaten the peace.
students.skill_ex_description: Repositions the closest ally to the selected location and heals them for <?1> of healing power.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 35s, heals the ally with the lowest HP for <?1> of healing power.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:OppressionResist> by <?1>.
students.weapon_name_jp: タクティカルセラピー
students.weapon_skill_passive_description: Increases healing power <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

students.profile_en:
Librarian of the Trinity Library Committee.

A bookworm and a bibliophile, she is one of the few students who has read every single tome in Trinity Library. She loves recommending books as much as she does reading them, and has a habit of making book recommendations to people she's just met based on their preferences.
students.skill_ex_description: Deploys cover with HP equal to a set amount <?1>and increases the <b:DEF> of allies in a circular area around it by <?2> for 30s.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 35s, grants a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of healing power to the ally with the lowest HP lasting up to 16s.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:DEF> by <?1>.
students.weapon_name_jp: ライブラリールーラー
students.weapon_skill_passive_description: Increases healing power <b:HealPower> by <?1> plus a further <?2>.

students.profile_en:
A member of the Vigilante Crew responsible for protecting Trinity's students.

To combat the increasing number of attacks on Trinity's students at the hands of the other academies, Suzumi volunteered to patrol the streets to abate attackers. Often misunderstood as cold and unfeeling due to her strong sense of justice, she actually has a friendly side as well.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area<?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_sub_description: Deals an additional <?1> damage to enemies inflicted with a crowd-control effect.

students.hobbies: Participating in events, collecting limited-edition desserts
students.profile_en:
A member of the Trinity After-School Sweets Club.

A girl with a height complex that gives off the impression of a small, angry animal. Constantly fixated on appearing more mature, her tendency to wear her heart on her sleeve gets her into trouble. She can't help but smile widely when visiting dessert cafes to sample the latest limited-edition treats.
students.skill_ex_description: Deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area and inflicts <c:Stunned> for <?2>.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:OppressionResist> by <?1>.

students.skill_ex_name_jp: みなさん、こちらに耳を傾けてください！
students.skill_ex_description: Increases the <b:CriticalChance> and <b:CriticalDamage> by <?1>, <b:MoveSpeed> by 30.8% but decreases <d:Range> by 38.5% of all nearby allies for 30s.
students.skill_normal_name_jp: 巧妙なアジテーション
students.skill_normal_description: Every 30s, deals <?1> damage to one enemy.
students.skill_sub_description: Deals an additional <?1> damage to enemies with a shield.

students.skill_ex_description: Deploys Cherino riding Purge-kun No.1 for 50s, with an additional <?1> of Cherino's attack. Every 3 normal attacks, fires a shot that deals <?2> damage to one enemy plus <?3> damage to the target and enemies in a fan-shaped area behind them. Only one tactical support vehicle may be deployed at any given time.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 15s, deals <?1> damage to enemies in a circular area.
students.skill_sub_description: Increases all allies' <b:CriticalChance> by <?1>.

students.skill_ex_name_jp: 戦闘用A型エネルギー剤
students.skill_ex_description: Increases the <b:AttackSpeed> by <?1> of one ally for 30s. Cannot target self.
students.skill_normal_description: Every 25s, increases the <b:AttackSpeed> of one ally by <?1> for 30s.
students.skill_sub_description: When Chinatsu uses her EX skill, she gains a <b:Shield> with HP equal to <?1> of healing power lasting up to 30s.

Buff_AttackSpeed.name: attack speed
Buff_AttackSpeed.tooltip: Increases speed of normal attacks and reduces attack delay.

Buff_BlockRate.name: block rate
Buff_BlockRate.tooltip: Increases the chance of blocking attacks when taking cover.

Buff_CriticalChance.name: critical chance
Buff_CriticalChance.tooltip: Increases the chance of dealing a critical hit.

Buff_CriticalChanceResistPoint.name: critical resistance
Buff_CriticalChanceResistPoint.tooltip: Decreases the chance of receiving a critical hit.

Buff_CriticalDamage.name: critical damage
Buff_CriticalDamage.tooltip: Increases the damage dealt by critical hits.

Buff_DamagedRatio.name: damage taken
Buff_DamagedRatio.tooltip: Decreases all damage taken by a fixed percentage.

Buff_Dodge.name: evasion
Buff_Dodge.tooltip: Increases the chance to dodge enemy attacks.

Buff_HealEffectiveness.name: healing received
Buff_HealEffectiveness.tooltip: Increases the amount of HP restored by healing abilities targeting this character by a fixed percentage.

Buff_HealPower.name: healing power
Buff_HealPower.tooltip: Increases healing power, increasing the effectiveness healing and barrier abilities.

Buff_OppressionPower.name: CC power
Buff_OppressionPower.tooltip: Increases the chance of inflicting a crowd-control effect.

Buff_OppressionResist.name: CC resistance
Buff_OppressionResist.tooltip: Decreases the chance of being inflicted with a crowd-control effect.

Buff_Range.name: attack range
Buff_Range.tooltip: Increases the distance from which this character can attack from.

Buff_Shield.name: barrier
Buff_Shield.tooltip: Absorbs a fixed amount of damage.

Buff_Stability.name: stability
Buff_Stability.tooltip: Increases the chance of dealing maximum damage.

Debuff_AttackSpeed.name: attack speed
Debuff_AttackSpeed.tooltip: Decreases speed of normal attacks and increases attack delay.

Debuff_BlockRate.name: block rate
Debuff_BlockRate.tooltip: Decreases the chance of blocking attacks when taking cover.

Debuff_ConcentratedTarget.name: focus
Debuff_ConcentratedTarget.tooltip: All allies will prioritise attacking the target marked with focus.

Debuff_CriticalChance.name: critical chance
Debuff_CriticalChance.tooltip: Decreases the chance of dealing a critical hit.

Debuff_CriticalChanceResistPoint.name: critical resistance
Debuff_CriticalChanceResistPoint.tooltip: Increases the chance of receiving a critical hit.

Debuff_CriticalDamage.name: critical damage
Debuff_CriticalDamage.tooltip: Decreases the damage dealt by critical hits.

Debuff_DamagedRatio.name: damage taken
Debuff_DamagedRatio.tooltip: Increases all damage taken by a fixed percentage.

Debuff_Dodge.name: evasion
Debuff_Dodge.tooltip: Decreases the chance to dodge attacks.

Debuff_HealEffectiveness.name: healing received
Debuff_HealEffectiveness.tooltip: Decreases the amount of HP restored by healing abilities by a fixed percentage.

Debuff_OppressionPower.name: CC power
Debuff_OppressionPower.tooltip: Decreases the chance of inflicting a crowd-control effect.

Debuff_OppressionResist.name: CC resistance
Debuff_OppressionResist.tooltip: Increases the chance of being inflicted with a crowd-control effect.

Debuff_Range.name: attack range
Debuff_Range.tooltip: Decreases the distance from which this character can attack from.

Debuff_Stability.name: stability
Debuff_Stability.tooltip: Decreases the chance of dealing maximum damage.

CC_Fear.name: fear
CC_Fear.tooltip: Target will not attack and slowly move away from who inflicted fear on them. Also interrupts any active skills.

CC_Stunned.name: stun
CC_Stunned.tooltip: Target will not act and interrupts any active skills.

CC_Provoke.name: taunts
CC_Provoke.tooltip: Target will be forced to attack whoever inflicted taunt on them for a short duration. Also interrupts any active skills.

Special_EnergyBatteryHalf.name: charge level
Special_EnergyBatteryHalf.tooltip: Increases the effectiveness of some of Aris's abilities. Charge level is reset after she uses her EX skill.

Special_Fury.name: enraged
Special_Fury.tooltip: Increases the effectiveness of some of Neru's abilities.
